name: @desktop-mcp/monorepo
description: WebRTC-based desktop control MCP server with real-time screen sharing and remote input

scripts.build: npx tsc -p packages/shared/tsconfig.json && npx tsc -p packages/agent/tsconfig.json && npx tsc -p packages/server/tsconfig.json
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=packages/shared && npm run test --workspace=packages/server
scripts.lint: npx tsc -p packages/shared/tsconfig.json --noEmit && npx tsc -p packages/agent/tsconfig.json --noEmit && npx tsc -p packages/server/tsconfig.json --noEmit

author: Jarvis Jagjerez
